Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Andrea Suárez on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 39 years, Andrea Suárez has established herself as a key player in the industry.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Andrea Suárez has been happily married to Jiménez since 1988. Andrea and Jiménez have 2 children, named Emma and Gómez.
Education Background:
In 1981, Andrea finished her secondary school education at Colegio Jesús-María Tarragona.
Andrea attended University of Valencia and graduated in 1985.
Occupation History:
Andrea Suárez is a 63 year old retired Venture Capitalist from Spain.
Andrea Suárez launched her career as a Research Scientist at Oryzon Genomics S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 1986 to 1989.
Her subsequent role was as a Biotech Startup Founder at PharmaMar S.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 1989 to 1990.
In 1991, she joined Oryzon Genomics S.A. as a CEO, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
In 1994, she transitioned to Almirall S.A. to take on the position of Venture Capitalist, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 1420000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Málaga and San Sebastián, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Andrea as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
